entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing this morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
